ygData.subject: Re: Root spell
ygData.msgSnippet: it will get more effective.  Dont forget, you will only be successful in rooting creatures that consider blue or white.  Normally BLUE is the best best to root
ygData.messageBody:
it will get more effective. Dont forget, you will only be successful in
rooting creatures that consider blue or white. Normally BLUE is the best
best to root when soloing. Also you have to max out your alteration skill
for it to work best. This means casting root alot (on your self or MOB
prefeably..never cast it around NPC's ...death will result). I bought Fade(
or get shadow step) and cast that alot. It will increase fast as you cast
this FADE or SS spell. Plus the mana cost is low and casts quickly.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan [mailto:gemd@...]
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 7:02 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Root spell


From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>

I recently purchased the root spell and tried it out on an easy target, a
large rat, to see how well it would work. I'm currently level 7. The spell
hardly ever works for me. Will it be more effective the more you cast it? I
can't see trying to use it on higher level creatures to gain xp if I can't
even root a large rat.

Greg (Kronan)
